name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and parmesan. Combine everything.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix all ingredients. Pour batter on pan. Cook until golden on both sides.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill chicken. Toss with lettuce, parmesan, croutons, and dressing.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter the bread, add cheese, and grill until golden brown.

name: Iced Lemon Tea
instructions: Brew tea. Add lemon and sugar. Pour over ice.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon, salt, and pepper. Spread on toast.

name: Veggie Burrito Bowl
instructions: Cook rice. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Top with salsa and avocado.

name: Beef Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry beef. Add veggies and sauce. Serve with rice.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Hummus & Veggie Wrap
instructions: Spread hummus on tortilla. Add veggies. Roll up and slice.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook chicken in curry powder. Add onion, garlic, tomato, and rice. Serve with rice.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Cook vegetables in beef broth. Serve with rice.

name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Grill salmon with lemon, garlic, salt, and pepper.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
instructions: Blend strawberries, milk, sugar, and ice until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Add basil and olive oil. Serve with balsamic glaze.

name: Tuna Salad
instructions: Mix tuna, mayonnaise, mustard, celery, and onion. Serve with bread.

name: Vegetable Pizza
instructions: Spread pizza dough. Add tomatoes, onion, bell peppers, mushrooms, and olive oil. Bake at 450Â°F for 15 minutes.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Mix lettuce, tomatoes, onion, olive oil, and vinegar. Serve with bread.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Add chicken and Alfredo sauce. Serve with parmesan and garlic.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef. Add lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese to tortillas. Serve with salsa.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Cook vegetables in beef broth. Serve with rice.
